articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Mt. Myohyang Recreation Ground
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Mt. Myohyang Recreation Ground
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly-built Mt. Myohyang Recreation Ground.
					After being briefed about the ground before its guide map he toured the long tourist course extending from the entrance to Habiro to Manphok Ravine for hours to acquaint himself in detail about its construction.
					
					After feasting his eyes on the tourist route, pavilions, a flyover built in a peculiar style and resting places in perfect harmony with beautiful natural scenery, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the youth shock brigade members have spruced up Mt. Myohyang to be a wonderful recreation ground for the people.
					
					All the architectures including the flyover high up in the sky were designed in a peculiar way and the quality of their construction was ensured on the highest level, he remarked, adding that it is an admirable miracle that the province built such a wonderful recreation ground in a matter of six months with its own efforts. He extended thanks to the builders, highly appreciating their feats. 
					
					The Mt. Myohyang Recreation Ground has been spruced up better as one of eternal value, enabling the Korean people to fully enjoy cultural recreation in the world famous mountain, he said, adding that the laudable feats of the builders who contributed to the happiness of the people and the country's prosperity with all their wisdom and enthusiasm will be handed down together with the history of the building of a thriving nation.
					
					Triumphant events are taking place one after another on all fronts to the delight and excitement of the people this year, a year of drastic changes in which everything goes well, he said, stating with pride that this is the stirring reality of the prospering country approaching close to the gate of a thriving nation.
					
					Underlining the need to spruce up better Mt. Myohyang, the precious possession of the people, and hand it down to posterity, he advanced highly important tasks to be carried out in building the recreation ground and managing and operating it.
					
					He said that in order to make more people visit Mt. Myohyang in the future and enjoy cultural recreation, fully commanding a bird's-eye view of the scenery of the mountain, it is necessary to enhance the utility rate of the already built service and catering facilities and, at the same time, build more facilities to meet the growing demand.
					
					It is important to pave well the tourist route in order to make the visitors to go to and see all scenic spots, he said, stressing the need to concentrate efforts on finishing the route construction.
					
					What is most important in managing the recreation ground is to protect the natural environment, he said, underscoring the need to preserve even a stone and a tree to their original state and take a thoroughgoing measure to prevent the pollution of mountains and streams, in particular.
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greetes Austrian Federal President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greetes Austrian Federal President
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Heinz Fischer, Federal President of Austria, on its national day.
					Kim in the message extended warm congratulations to the president, wishing the Austrian people progress and prosperity and expressing belief that the relations between the DPRK and Austria would favorably develop.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Friendship Tower Sunday on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 Participating in the wreath-laying ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health who is chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, and others, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 On hand were Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Amid the playing of the wreath-laying music wreaths were laid before the Friendship Tower in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK, in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of People's Security, the Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Ministry of Culture, in the joint name of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, in the joint name of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK and the Pyongyang City People's Committee and in the name of the Chinese embassy here and the Central Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the CPV who entered into the Korean front and bravely fought before going round the tower.
					
					 On the same day wreaths were laid before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV in Hyongjesan District in the joint name of the Hyongjesan District Committee of Pyongyang City of the WPK and the Hyongjesan District People's Committee, in the name of a unit of the Korean People's Army and in the name of the Chinese embassy here and the Central Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean people pay respect to the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) and the Chinese people calling back with deep emotion the heroic fighting spirit and brilliant feats performed by the volunteers. 
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article dedicated to the significant 59th anniversary of the entry of the CPV into the Korean front.
					
					The Chinese party and government sent their excellent sons and daughters to the Korean front when the Korean people were undergoing grim hardship due to the provocation of the Korean war by the imperialist aggression forces early in the 1950s, thus positively helping the Korean army and people, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The mass heroism and self-sacrificing spirit displayed by the brave soldiers of the CPV during the last Fatherland Liberation War was the expression of warm support and encouragement of the Chinese people to the Korean people and they clearly showed the noble fraternal mission of the CPV and genuine cooperative spirit of the two peoples.
					
					Blood shed by the CPV penetrated into the mountains and fields of Korea.
					
					A momentum has been given to the atmosphere of the DPRK-China friendship this year marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					
					Visits and exchange are brisk between the two countries and friendship has further deepened this year, the "year of DPRK-China friendship".
					
					The Chinese people are now making positive efforts to step up the construction of a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific view on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary. The appearance of China has undergone change with each passing day and its international prestige has risen.
					
					The Korean people wish the Chinese people greater success in their efforts for socialist modernization with the Chinese characteristics.
					
					The Korean people will as ever make positive efforts to further consolidate the bilateral friendship. The immortal feats performed by the fallen fighters of the CPV in the great Fatherland Liberation War waged by the Korean people will be handed down to posterity along with the history of the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: 888th Wednesday Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
888th Wednesday Rally Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Victims of the sexual slavery joined the members of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps, the Puchon Citizens Federation and other civic and social organizations of south Korea in their 888th Wednesday rally held in Seoul on Oct. 21 for the solution to the issue of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the council, referred to the fact that international solidarity organizations including the council and Japanese civic organizations have conducted activities for the solution to the said issue but Japan has evaded its responsibility far from admitting its past crimes related to sexual slavery.
					
					She appealed to various organizations to conduct more dynamic actions to force the Japanese government to make an official apology and legal reparation for the crimes related to "comfort women" as soon as possible.
					
					Hwang In O, co-representative of the Puchon Citizens Federation, said that 17 years have passed since many people held the Wednesday rallies with the victims of sexual slavery. Hwang stressed the need for the citizens in Puchon to take the lead in the movement to force Japan to liquidate its crimes.
					
					Kil Won Ok, "comfort woman" victim, said that all the victims would struggle till the last moments of their lives to have the issue settled despite their advanced ages of 80 and 90. 
					
					A statement was read out at the rally.

articles.title: WPK's Songun Politics Supported
articles.content:
WPK's Songun Politics Supported
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador to Denmark paid a courtesy call on Jorgen Petersen, chairman of the National Leadership of the Danish Communist Party, on Oct. 15.
					The chairman said that the DCP supports the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea and would express invariable support and solidarity with the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.
					
					He continued with high appreciation that the army and people of the DPRK are firmly defending socialism in the 100-day campaign in the wake of having achieved the great successes in the 150-day campaign thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's leadership of the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Party Building Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Party Building Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Leobardo Alcantara Martinez, member of the National Executive Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico and director of the party training institution, on a visit to the DPRK praised the exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed for the development of the Workers' Party of Korea when interviewed by KCNA on Oct. 24.
					Saying that the unique politics enforced by Kim Jong Il is an invincible one displaying its tremendous might and vitality, he went on:
					
					Leading the WPK, Kim Jong Il has pursued the politics of loving care and trust in the people.
					
					The course of victory and glory covered by the WPK is associated with the trace of his noble leadership.
					
					Thanks to Kim Jong Il, the WPK has demonstrated its might as a militant party that has achieved unity and cohesion in thinking and purpose based on strong senses of organization and discipline and as a revolutionary party that enjoys absolute support and trust from the popular masses.
					
					Kim Jong Il is a rare statesman as he developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, an invincible revolutionary party.
					
					The DPRK is sure to triumph in building a great prosperous and powerful nation thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and powerful strength of its army and people rallied close around the WPK.
